description: Styling for the PostCard component, defining layout, appearance, and responsive behavior of various elements including headers, images, and timestamps.

classes.name: post-card
classes.description: Main container for the post card component, handling layout and styling.

classes.name: post-card__header
classes.description: Header section of the post card, including avatar and user information.

classes.name: post-card__avatar
classes.description: Styling for the user's avatar displayed in the header.

classes.name: post-card__img
classes.description: Styling for the image displayed in the post card.

classes.name: post-card__body
classes.description: Body section of the post card containing the caption.

classes.name: post-card__caption
classes.description: Styling for the caption text within the post card.

classes.name: post-card__user-short
classes.description: Styling for the shortened user display.

classes.name: post-card__timestamp
classes.description: Styling for the timestamp of the post.
